attributes.action: Reconsider the proposal to abolish District Councils in Durham and Northumberland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of County Durham have expressed very strong preference to retain District Councils as part of their local government arrangements.  A recent ( albeit unofficial) Referendum showed that over 70% of electors (from a return of 40% ) wish to retain their District Councils.  The reasons for these are many but the message is singular.  A single unitary councils for the County is not wanted by the only people who matter - the electors.
